7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.02cb2645-d331-4645-b5b5-0352279882a4.description=Sleeps for X seconds 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.2328e36d-85c6-4feb-9c34-ee5818b2102d.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.3368be97-5e8d-4d10-b814-2e0699ab9d3c.prompt=Service\: 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.3c7ab399-dd16-4200-a5fb-54f8e3ab820e.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.517d607d-041d-4481-9f02-7b84285378c9.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.52d5078a-b347-4d89-902d-ddfd0d3bada2.description=Adds a value into the global context (available to all parent and child flows) Input Parameters\: keyName - the name of the context variable to use myValue - the value to assign the context variable Responses\: Done - assigned the context variable Scriptlet Example\: [$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue]; 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.60a5f270-cbad-4e46-9eaf-699a790a9c2e.prompt=Alertnate Credentials - Password\: 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.90f75b72-39bf-41c0-a76a-6ca628e35591.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.d371243b-9026-454e-a498-119b2ba14bef.prompt=Alertnate Credentials - UserName\: 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.description=
Restarts a windows service

Inputs\:
host - The host on which the service resides.
service - The service to restart.
altuser - The username to user when authenticating with host.
altpass - The password to user when authenticating with host.

Responses\:
success - Service restarted successfully.
failure - Service could not be restarted.
service failed to restart - Service was stopped, but would not restart.
service didn't stop - Service failed to stop.
7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.eddccde1-d1fa-4734-be28-301c12bdb796.prompt=HostName\: 7480798c-335b-4ff2-9ca2-ebd11966e43e.eede0f99-e640-43a2-b89e-174078ca4a45.description=Does The Specified Windows Service Exist
flow.name: Restart Windows Service

scriptlet.name: Step Set Global Context Value in Flow Restart Windows Service (ac5070d8-213d-48c0-9010-b325ed77a905)
